title: Shitsurengo, Kenaku datta Osananajimi Ga sato Kashi Mitai ni Amai - Sugar After Bitter
description:
Yuu Sawatari, a high school boy, is sick after suffering a painful heartbreak. His nextdoor childhood friend, Cocoa Shirayuki, shows up to take care of him. From that day on, the distance between them grows closer... This is a tense, sweet, and slightly heartrending love story of a boy who has lost his love and his childhood friend whose love has long been unrequited.

-From MD
author: Nanaumi Sou
